problem.markdown:
In C3-01, the mass of water is changed from 2 kg to 5 kg. Will there be a change in the dryness fraction of the final state? ( ) Yes (x) No ( ) Cannot be determined
[explanation] Both sides of the previous equation will get changed proportionately and we will still get the same x. [explanation]
problem.p: In C3-01, the mass of water is changed from 2 kg to 5 kg. Will there be a change in the dryness fraction of the final state?

div.p: Both sides of the previous equation will get changed proportionately and we will still get the same x.
